text: Holy Trinity Church is an Anglican church which has an interesting history and architectural design. To get to Holy Trinity Church, take the MRT train to Lavender MRT Station, exit through Exit B of the station, and walk along Horne Road until you reach the end of the road. There is a plaque nearby which tells you of the history of the church.

Visit to the Anglican Holy Trinity Church,  Hamiltons' Rd; a beautiful baroque
architecture with traces of British
Colonial past : site in in Central District
of Jakan Besar; splendour at its height:
traces to green hues encapsulated
longevity  and rejuvenation in keeping
with the green environment.
This church has an unusual Chinese architecture.

Sunday worship services at Holy Trinity Church (Anglican) are held at the following times:

Foochow Congregation: 8.45am
English Congregation: 8.45am and 11am
Hokkien Congregation: 11am

Seniors Fellowship Services are held on Fridays at 10am.

A thousand apologies for those who come on Mondays! There are no office hours on Mondays.

Be it tourist or local, Everyone is Warmly Welcomed!
